prepare_models[source]

prepare_models(cfg)

Load tokenizers and models for vm, pp, sts. Pad the first embedding layer if specified in the config. Do layer freezing if specified (TODO). Update config with some model-specific variables.

{% endraw %} {% raw %}
{% endraw %}

Usage

Externally we only need the prepare_models(cfg) function. This gives all the models and tokenizers needed for the other sections and updates the config.

{% raw %} 
cfg = Config().simple_dataset()
vm_tokenizer, vm_model, pp_tokenizer, pp_model, sts_model, cfg = prepare_models(cfg)
{% endraw %}
